segments.text: How do you put this seat back ? I know there is a lever somewhere .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm getting dressed , what does it look like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It looks like you are about to get dressed . Did you forget we are in a car on the road ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm good at this . Nobody will see anything .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you kidding ? You're going to cause an accident just from people gawking !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right , pull over at that service station and I'll dress in the ladies ' room .
segments.speaker: S1
